item.title: CVE-2022-2988|2024-08-03T00:53:00.478Z -- schneider%20electric -- somachine%20hvac
item.description: A CWE-787: Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability exists that could cause sensitive information leakage when accessing a malicious web page from the commissioning software. Affected Products: SoMachine HVAC (Versions prior to V2.1.0), EcoStruxure Machine Expert â€“ HVAC (Versions prior to V1.4.0)
